name: steam-sentinel
description: Steam価格監視システム - セール時の過去最安値更新を検知し、WebサイトとDiscord通知で情報提供

scripts.lint: echo "Lint skipped for TypeScript files - using tsc for type checking"
scripts.release: npm run clean && npm install && npm run typecheck && npm run lint && npm version patch && git add package.json package-lock.json && git commit -m "chore: bump version to $(node -p "require('./package.json').version")" && git tag v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")
scripts.release:minor: npm run clean && npm install && npm run typecheck && npm run lint && npm version minor && git add package.json package-lock.json && git commit -m "chore: bump version to $(node -p "require('./package.json').version")" && git tag v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")
scripts.release:major: npm run clean && npm install && npm run typecheck && npm run lint && npm version major && git add package.json package-lock.json && git commit -m "chore: bump version to $(node -p "require('./package.json').version")" && git tag v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")
